title: Arcoris Soho, Mont Kiara

FACILITIES
- Covered parking
- Swimming pool
- 24-hour security
- Wading pool
- Plazas
- Hotel
- Sky pool
- Function room
- Multi-purpose room
- Tennis court
- Facility-cum-badminton court

Arcoris is a mixed development located within the thriving hub of Mont Kiara. It comprises of 5 components such as Hotel, Retail, Business Suites, SoHo & Serviced Residence. Arcoris was developed by Sunrise responsible for several award-winning developments. The development is expected to be completed in year 2016.

Arcoris comprises 2 blocks of of 35-storey and 18-storey towers, known as the Southern block and Northern block respectively. The development houses 5 components including Business Suites (Office), SOHO, Serviced Residences, Plaza (Retail) and Hotel. There are a total of 262 units of prime Business Suites (Office) with built-up sizes ranging from 660 sf to 1,550 sf. SOHO units on the other hand with total of 336 units, have built-up size from 450 sf to 1,000 sf.

Southern Tower (35-storey) comprises Hotel, Business Suites & SoHo. The Serviced Residences can only be found on the Northern Tower (18-storey), and typically have a built-up size of about 850 sf for 2-bedroom, up to 2,000 sf for a 3-bedroom unit. Pampered with luxury, residents of Arcoris are able to enjoy the meticulously planned and designed Plazas which host shops, restaurants, beautifully landscaped courtyards that are encircled by lush greenery.
